title: The Exchange: A Down Under take on Trump
description:
Former Australia Prime Minister Kevin Rudd gives the U.S. president some credit for his dealings with North Korea’s Kim Jong Un. But he explains that Donald Trump’s protectionism has enraged China’s leaders and may play into the hands of the country’s own nationalists. See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
